title: The Dreamer
description: The future came to him in dreams, dreams he should have stayed quiet about and dreams he should have spoken aloud. Tad was no ordinary boy. He was born with an ability to see the future but in the form of sweet dreams and horrible nightmares. But despite having the ability to shape his own path, there were things beyond his control.Set in a parallel universe and inspired by true events, the story of Tad journeys from his teenage years all the way to adulthood where he has to constantly answer one question; will his dreams prevail or will he fail?
author: Jeyna Grace
